meta.title: ImageWhisper - AI Image Captioning
meta.description: Upload an image and get an AI-generated caption with ImageWhisper.

homePage.title: ImageWhisper
homePage.subtitle: Let AI paint a thousand words for your pictures.

imageCaptioningForm.cardDescription: Upload an image or provide image URLs (one per line) and our AI will describe them for you.
imageCaptioningForm.uploadSupportedFormats: PNG, JPG, GIF, WEBP up to 4MB
imageCaptioningForm.urlsLabel: Or Enter Image URLs (one per line)
imageCaptioningForm.urlsEmptyError: Please enter at least one image URL.
imageCaptioningForm.apiError: Failed to generate captions. Please check the URLs and try again.
imageCaptioningForm.fileTooLargeError: File is too large. Maximum size is 4MB.
imageCaptioningForm.fileReadError: Failed to read the image file.
imageCaptioningForm.unknownError: An unknown error occurred while generating the caption.
imageCaptioningForm.captionPlaceholder: Your image caption will appear here once generated.
imageCaptioningForm.imageAndCaptionPlaceholder: Upload an image or enter URLs to see previews and captions.
imageCaptioningForm.poweredBy: Powered by Genkit and Gemini model.
